home.title: Hello, I'm Rudio
home.subtitle: With solid experience in Full Stack development, I work on creating scalable, secure, and user-centered applications. In recent years, I have participated in the design and implementation of innovative features both on the front-end and back-end, ensuring performance, simple maintenance, and fluid experiences.
home.description: I have expertise in technologies such as C#, .NET, PHP, Laravel, React, Node.js, and SQL/NoSQL databases, as well as experience with API development, authentication, and cloud integration. My focus is to deliver reliable and efficient digital solutions, always applying best practices and code quality.
home.objective: Driven by curiosity and continuous learning, my goal is to develop solutions that connect people and technology effectively and impactfully.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've developed

vegeta.title: Vegeta Final PI - Mobile API
vegeta.description: Laravel API for guitar pedal mobile app backend. Complete system with authentication, product management, reviews, comments, and product transfers between users.

cybergallery.title: Cyber Gallery
cybergallery.description: Modern and responsive photo gallery with cyberpunk design. Elegant interface for image display with visual effects and intuitive navigation.

refeicoes.title: Meal Management System
refeicoes.description: Web application for meal management with frontend and backend. Complete system for menu control, ingredients, and meal planning.

tarefas.title: Task Management System
tarefas.description: Complete web system for task management with separate frontend and backend. Modern and intuitive interface for creating, editing, and tracking tasks.

brunelly.title: Brunelly Baiocco Website
brunelly.description: Professional website developed for Brunelly Baiocco. Elegant and responsive design focused on personal presentation and portfolio.

agcustom.title: AG Custom Website
agcustom.description: Corporate website for AG Custom with modern and functional design. Professional interface for presenting company services and products.
